title: New: Milo M – New York
body:
London’s Milo M popped up over a year ago now with his sombre debut track, Suburbia.

Returning after a long twelve months with new number, New York, with Milo’s baritone drawl again taking centre stage, it’s another promising step from this elusive artist.

excerpt.full: London’s Milo M popped up over a year ago now with his sombre debut track, Suburbia. Returning after a long twelve months with new number, New York, with Milo’s baritone drawl again taking centre stage, it’s another promising step from this elusive artist.
excerpt.short: London's Milo M popped up over a year ago now with his sombre debut track, Suburbia.
